title: SIN. CURSE. PAIN.
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimalist-bhl]]

> = Seems like you open the link on the main page, 
> = you open the back door of that mortuary, just kidding.

> **CONTENT WARNING**
> This page is fully about SCP-073 and his brother SCP-076-02, I have no idea why I have drawn so many pieces about them... In consideration that the works contained a lot of potentially uncomfortable and sensitive content, and even insulted immoral content.
> Felt sorry about the crime that I have committed.
> But I'll do something like this again.
[[>]]
> ——BY Saltywater
[[/>]]

------
